system.description: You reshape a creature’s skin and other external tissues. The modification occupies an inventory slot. The transformation requires 1 day.

power.overcharge: The growths develop instantly, dealing [[/r 1d6x]] damage. Note: Multiple uses on a single individual are dangerous. Epidermal Effects Some complex sculpts require a biomantic roll.
